name: Whirly Toad
description:
Whirly Toad

A dizzying arcade game in which you have to control a constantly spinning toad, helping her to catch coins.
Touch the screen to control the hero, collect coins and take first place in the global ratings.

Available on Features
  • Just-tap control
  • Highscore leaderboard
  • Total score leaderboard
Upcoming
  • New player skins
  • New achievements
  • Other ways to get a reward
Tools used
  • Construct 3
  • Aseprite
  • Audiojungle
